SCTX:
Begin SpyMasterScript

short gone
;after he has left for the empire

short currentDay
short localDaysPassed
Short NoLore	;blocks discussion of general topics


if ( menumode == 1)
	return
endif


;***********************************************************
;
;		check for the one day passed while he looks at info from Vivec informants
;
;***********************************************************
if ( GetJournalIndex "A1_V_VivecInformants" >= 50 )		

	if ( currentDay != Day )
		set currentDay to Day
		set localDaysPassed to localDaysPassed + 1
	endif

endif






;***********************************************************
;
;		make him leave
;
;***********************************************************

if ( gone == 0 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex "A2_4_MiloGone" >= 1 )
		if ( CellChanged == 1 )
			"Caius Cosades"->Disable
			set gone to 1
		endif
	endif
endif


End
